DOC.brief_summary: Systemic Inflammatory response syndrome ( SIRS ) common patient severe acute pancreatitis ( SAP ) early stage . Continuous Blood Purification ( CBP ) , especially Continuous Veno-Venous Hemofiltration ( CVVH ) prove important role SAP patient control SIRS . But detail treatment controversial . In study , investigator aim evaluate different effect three kind treatment protocol CVVH 6h , continuous venovenous hemodiafiltration ( CVVHDF ) 6h , CVVH 10h first three day SAP patient . Compare vital sign , SIRS parameter , others three group . This study try find good way CBP patient SAP
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Blood Purification Regulation Early Inflammatory Response In Severe Acute Pancreatitis
